summary: The customer was having trouble purchasing internet access from their Contoso Wireless account. The agent provided the customer with the account number and explained that the fastest speed available was 50 Mbps for $60 per month plus taxes and fees. The agent then provided the customer with instructions on how to purchase the service directly from their account page. The agent also let the customer know that if they experience any issues while making the purchase, they should reach out to them again and they will be happy to help out.
